title: Happy Birthday, Shizuku-chan!
detail_text: <:th_ch0208/>Shizuku-chan, happy happy birthday!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Thank you, Emma-san!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Here, it’s your present<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Waah, a ticket holder…. I’m really happy!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>On top of that, for the whole day today, I’ll do anything that you want me to do♪ If you have a request, just say it!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Hmm? Did you say…. anything?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Yeah, anything!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Umm, then, lend me your ears for a bit….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Hmm hmm…. Hmm hmm…. Whaat, you’re fine with that? So you want to try using my lap as a pillow like Kanata-chan, you can ask for other requests you know?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Kyaaaaa! Emma-san! Don’t say it out loud-!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
